title: Meeting with the Los Angeles Slavic Refugee Community
excerpt: SEM team met with Slavic refugees in Los Angeles to provide guidance on employment, community integration, and future planning as they build new lives in the U.S.
content: On December 14, 2024, the SEM team held several impactful meetings in Los Angeles with refugees from the former Soviet Union. These discussions focused on the challenges they face as they settle into life in the United States. The team provided guidance on critical areas such as securing employment, integrating into local communities, and planning for their future. This visit reflects SEMâ€™s ongoing commitment to supporting Slavic refugees as they build new lives and establish themselves in their new home.
